mapper.select: SELECT r.REVIEW_NO, r.USER_NO, r.REVIEW_TARGET, r.REVIEW_DATE, r.REVIEW_COMMENT, r.REVIEW_RATING, r.COMMON_NO, u.USER_ID FROM netflix.review r INNER JOIN netflix.user u ON r.USER_NO = u.USER_NO WHERE r.REVIEW_TARGET = #{reviewTarget}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO netflix.review (USER_NO, REVIEW_TARGET, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_COMMENT, REVIEW_RATING, COMMON_NO) VALUES(#{userNo}, #{reviewTarget}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{reviewComment}, #{reviewRating}, 301)
